tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Rajanshu Tiwari's approach is very humane. He makes you comfortable with talks soothing to the patient. He has a smiling profile and makes the patient at home plus explains the procedure of treatment.

The doc is accessible easily and he responds immediately if the call couldn't be attended.

My blood sugar was high and  Dr. Rajanshu took it as a priority n brought down the level to normal (90/145)

The hospital I was in previously was giving priority to other aspects but when I changed doctors and met Dr. Rajanshu, he knew my priority was diabetes.

Thanks to Dr. Rajanshu Tiwari to make me look normal. Anyone who sees me cannot believe that I was previously hospitalised for 12 days n had undergone such harrowing experience.
reply_text: Thanks for the kinds word sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** His medications has helped in controlling diabetes of my mother for years. He has also helped me with Stress management. Has always been supportive and easily approachable in tough times. Has a friendly approach and a unique style of treatment for his patients. He fits into a role of a perfect family doctor. I have personally experienced and strongly recommend his services.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for the kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: None
review: Visited the doctor for a skin infection since he is listed as a general physician on the platform. After we reached the clinic, we saw that he is a diabetologist. In his consultation he connected everything to diabetes and ordered tests from his own lab. His lab took 2X the amount of money for *** ****** blood test like heamoglobin, lipid profile,etc. Also the medicines provides costed higher *** **** *** **** *** ** * ********** The whole visit costed us 7k tests doctor fees and medicine included. Now everything is fine in reports, even better than what was last year. ****** ** ** order tests when we asked him genuine questions on lesions happening on the same place again and again. **** ******* ***** ***** **** *** ****** ***** he connected things to diabetes and ordered tests. ******* ****** ** ****** **** ****** **** ******** ** ******* **** *** **** * ******* ********* ******* ** ************* *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Tiwari is good to dealt with the diseases and very friendly. Dr Tiwari knows how to treat a patient. It's very important that a doctor give a mental satisfaction with his behavior. A good doctor can help people learn to cope with stressful situations, overcome addictions, manage their chronic illnesses, and tests and assessments that can help diagnose a condition or tell more about the way a person thinks, feels, and behaves. These are the benefits u ll get with Dr Tiwari. A real moral booster. Kahte hai aadhi bimari mental hoti hai.  Thank you so much Dr. Tiwari sir. Regards Amitabh Gunjan
